task.summary: Create model files - Like and Post model files created
Create user model files - User model file created - User migration file created
Create user model files - User model file created - User migration file created - ide helper installed
Create model for Like and Post
Set relationship between models - Like model has a relationship with User and Post - User model has a relationship with Post and Like - Post model has a relationship with User and Like
Post and Like migration's table created
register and login routes get set - getsignUp and postsignIn routes created - getsignUp and postsignIn functions created into UserController

add possible validation errors - while register or login, possible validation issues are fixed - after user sign in, navbar has a logout button - in routes added 'logout' route - after register user automatically will sign in and redirect to index
